Fire Bola

one handed weapon (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 72
weap id [weapon]: 301 (Fire Bola)
range [range]: strength
precision [prec]: +2
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
ammunition [ammo]: 50
 
(Bludgeoning Damage [blunt], Magic weapon [magic])

Extra effect on hit: Fire Bonds

weap id [weapon]: 302 (Fire Bonds)
damage [dmg]: Special
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 5F to forge (F1)

This weapon is composed of three glowing metal lumps tied together with a cord of fire. When thrown against an enemy, it will wrap itself around the target, burning and immobilizing him. The bola will reform itself in its user's hands after being thrown.
